document.full_text: floundering hipster brand american apparel  posted a loss of $86 million in 2010, and said it may have to file for bankruptcy protection if it did not manage to get enough funds to keep going, a filing dated march 31 said.
document.title: american apparel posts yearly loss, may file for bankruptcy
lines_and_colors: floundering hipster brand american apparel  posted a loss of $86 million in 2010, and said it may have to file for bankruptcy protection if it did not manage to get enough funds to keep going, a filing dated march 31 said.
